content:
Hello,

$get-resource-counts: we are using this operation to get the count of all resources in the HAPI server. But it seems the resource count returned for each resource type is not limited to active latest version resources. Does it also count the deleted resources? can anyone please shed light on this. thank you! @James Agnew @Grahame Grieve
The counts returned by this operation include deleted resources and non-deleted resources.
@James Agnew thank you for the confirmation!
